Comments_List: Lots of good info about various careers in science. Glad to hear that there are other options other then academia. Was also very interesting to hear about skills from current profs. Susan Baserga gave a amazing lecture!
I got to know different aspects of pharmaceutical and biotech industries. Also, I gained knowledge about being a better candidate for my career path.
Was done very well! I liked the format of the course. Would be interesting to hear more from the current professors as well as guest speakers.
